name: Dubspace - Chapter 1
description:
Dubspace revolves around physical interactions that rely on forces and impulses. Mailcom navigates the zero-gravity environment using his jetpack, as well as weapons, pushing and pulling objects and obstacles. He may move fast, but he must be careful.

Mailcom will explore dark and foreboding space stations, each with its own unique environment and set of challenges. These stations are filled with obstacles, traps, and other hazards.

Launching a heavy object into the path of an enemy, redirecting the projectile with a well-timed push or solving an environmental puzzle, players must make use of properties such as mass and bounciness to their advantage.

Enemies come in many forms and shapes, spawned in a variety of ways to create endless combat situations. With a choice of weapons, grenades and items at their disposal, players can eliminate enemies in any way they see fit.


NOTE: Controller is required for local multiplayer
